com.github.macgregor.alexandria.Context

  • Packages that use Context 
    Package Description
    com.github.macgregor.alexandria  

    • Uses of Context in com.github.macgregor.alexandria

      Methods in com.github.macgregor.alexandria that return Context 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context Context.addMetadata(Config.DocumentMetadata metadata)
      Safetly add new document metadata to the index, converting the source path to absolute if necessary.
      Context Context.ContextAware.alexandriaContext()
      Return the configured Alexandria Context.
      Context Context.config(Config config)
      Working Aleandria config containing document index and remote config.
      Context Context.configPath(Path configPath)
      Sets the path to the Alexandria config file.
      Context AlexandriaSync.context() 
      Context AlexandriaIndex.context() 
      Context BatchProcess.context() 
      Context AlexandriaConvert.context() 
      Context Alexandria.context() 
      Context Context.convertedPaths(Map<Config.DocumentMetadata,Path> convertedPaths)
      Cache for tracking absolute converted file paths for indexed metadata.
      Context Context.disclaimerFooterEnabled(boolean disclaimerFooterEnabled)
      Enables adding a footer to converted documents warning readers edits to files on the remote will be overridden.
      Context Context.disclaimerFooterPath(Optional<Path> disclaimerFooterPath)
      Path to a custom footer (markdown) file.
      Context Context.exclude(List<String> exclude)
      File exclude patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      Context Context.include(List<String> include)
      File include patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      static Context Context.load(String filePath)
      Initialize Alexandria's Context, loading the Config from the given file path.
      Context Context.makePathsAbsolute()
      Make all Config and Context paths absolute relative to configPath.
      Context Context.makePathsRelative()
      Make all Config and Context paths relative to configPath.
      Context Context.originalConfig(Config originalConfig)
      Alexandria config originally loaded from the file system, kept in case of failures saving back to the filesystem.
      Context Context.outputPath(Optional<Path> outputPath)
      Absolute path to output converted documents to.
      Context Context.projectBase(Path projectBase)
      Absolute path to the project base where Alexandria is being executed
      Context Context.remote(Optional<Remote> remote)
      Remote that has been configured and initialized, can be used to retrieve the remote for any class or method that has the context
      Context Context.searchPath(List<Path> searchPath)
      Absolute paths to use when searching for documents to index

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void AlexandriaConvert.addDisclaimer(Context context, Config.DocumentMetadata metadata)
      Adds a footer to the bottom of each markdown document before the final conversion to warn readers that they are not viewing the source document and changes will be overwritten.
